section.p: Reverently, you lay the money at the feet of the idol. Cross it off your Adventure Sheet.

The god rewards you with a blessing. Write in the Blessings box on your Adventure Sheet. The blessing works by allowing you to try again when you fail a MAGIC roll. It is good for only one reroll. When you use the blessing, cross it off your Adventure Sheet. You can have only one MAGIC blessing at any one time.
You take your leave of the primordial sun-god.

choices.choice: North to the Hall of Heroes
